skills.title: Root to Rise
skills.description: Increases your Maximum Health.

skills.title: Personal Space
skills.description: You deal Bonus Gun Damage* the closer you are to the target.

skills.title: Clarity
skills.description: You gain passive Health Regeneration. Activating an Action Skill grants stacking Health Regeneration for a short time. Max Stacks: unlimited Stack Duration: 5s

skills.title: Arms Deal
skills.description: Increases your Area Damage and Area Damage Resistance.

skills.title: Samsara
skills.description: Dealing Skill Damage with your Action Skill stacks Gun Damage and Health Regeneration for a long time. Max Stacks: 5 Stack Duration: 20s

skills.title: Helping Hand(s)
skills.description: Activating an Action Skill increases your Damage Resistance for a short time. Duration: 15s

skills.title: Mindfulness
skills.description: Taking damage stacks Movement Speed and Shield Recharge Delay for a short time. Max Stacks: 25 Stack Duration: 5s

skills.title: Find Your Center
skills.description: Increases your Melee Damage. Activating an Action Skill increases your Melee Range for a long time. Melee Range: +75% Duration: 20s

skills.title: Vigor
skills.description: Killing an enemy grants the team stacking Movement Speed for a short time. Max Stacks: unlimited Stack Duration: 8s

skills.title: One With Nature
skills.description: Increases your Maximum Health and Resistance towards your Attuned Element.

skills.title: Do unto Others
skills.description: Taking enemy damage causes you to send out an energy orb at the attacker, dealing [Attuned Element] Area Damage. Cooldown: 8s

skills.title: Jab Cross
skills.description: Dealing Melee Damage increases your Gun Damage and Skill Damage for a short time. Duration: 10s

skills.title: Guardian Angel
skills.description: Entering Fight for your Life grants you Second Wind, restores Health and creates an Elemental Nova that knocks back nearby enemies, dealing [Attuned Element] Area Skill Damage. Max-Health Restored: 50% Cooldown: 120s

skills.title: Blitz
skills.description: Increases your Melee Damage. Press [melee] while aiming at an enemy to dash forward and perform a Blitz Attack, dealing [Attuned Element] Melee Damage. The Blitz Attack deals Bonus Damage* and if it kills an enemy, its Cooldown is reset. Cooldown: 10s Melee Damage: +100% Blitz Bonus Damage: up to +83%

skills.title: Do Harm
skills.description: Killing an enemy grants you a Rush Stack. Activating an Action Skill consumes all stacks, and each grants Skill Damage for a long time. Max Rush Stacks: 10 Max Stacks: 99 Stack Duration: 20s

skills.title: Fast Hand(s)
skills.description: Increases your Reload Speed, Weapon Swap Speed, and Mode Switch Speed.

skills.title: Violent Tapestry
skills.description: Applying a Status Effect grants you a Rush Stack. Activating an Action Skill consumes all stacks, and each grants Status Effect Chance for a long time. Max Rush Stacks: 10 Max Stacks: 99 Stack Duration: 20s

skills.title: Alacrity
skills.description: Increases your Reload Speed for each Rush Stack. Activating an Action Skill consumes all stacks, and each grants Reload Speed for a short time. Activating an Action Skill early resets this bonus. Duration: 8s

skills.title: Transcend
skills.description: Activating an Action Skill stacks Critical Damage and Accuracy for a short time. Max Stacks: unlimited Stack Duration: 12s

skills.title: Restless
skills.description: Increases your Skill Cooldown Rate.

skills.title: Ascendant
skills.description: All Action Skill Augments gain increased effects. Soul Sap: +20% Lifesteal Allure: +100% Radius Glamour: +50% Duration Stillness of Mind: +0.75s Delay Revelation: +25% Damage Expedite: +15% Cooldown Rate

skills.title: From Rest
skills.description: Increases your Fire Rate and Charge Speed.

skills.title: Laid Bare
skills.description: Dealing Skill Damage with your Action Skill increases all Damage to that enemy for a short time. Duration: 8s

skills.title: Wrath
skills.description: Increases your Gun Damage. Activating an Action Skill doubles this bonus for a short time. Duration: 8s

skills.title: Remnant
skills.description: Killing an enemy with your Gun or Action Skill creates a homing Orb that explodes on enemy impact, dealing [Attuned Element] Area Skill Damage. The Orb receives Overkill Damage.

skills.title: Awakening
skills.description: Increases the Effect of your Rush Stack Bonuses.

skills.title: Avatar
skills.description: You can now activate your Action Skill once while it's on Cooldown. Killing an enemy with Skill Damage, refunds half of the Rush Stacks consumed by the Skill. Max Rush Stacks: +10

skills.title: Anima
skills.description: Increases your Status Effect Damage and Duration. Your Attuned Element receives double the Status Effect Damage. While attuned to Shock your Shock Status Effect Duration is further increased. Bug: Anima is inactive while attuned to Cryo.

skills.title: Steady Hand(s)
skills.description: Increases your Accuracy and Weapon Handling.

skills.title: Infusion
skills.description: Converts a portion of your Gun's Damage into your Attuned Element. Note: Damage from unlisted Projectiles isn't converted.

skills.title: Tempest
skills.description: Amara deals increased Elemental Damage. Shock Damage is further increased.

skills.title: Illuminated Fist
skills.description: Increases your Melee Damage. Converts your Melee Attacks' Damage into your Attuned Element.

skills.title: Wildfire
skills.description: Status Effects applied to an enemy have a chance to spread to a nearby enemy.

skills.title: Dread
skills.description: Grasping an enemy stacks Gun Damage for a short time. Any player who kills a grasped enemy refills their magazine. Stack Duration: 8s

skills.title: Indiscriminate
skills.description: Your bullets have a chance to ricochet off enemies towards other enemies at reduced damage. Enemies affected by Phasegrasp or Stillness of Mind* have increased Chance and Damage. Ricochet Damage: -50% Grasped: Ricochet Damage: -25%

skills.title: Deep Well
skills.description: Increases your Mag Size with elemental guns.

skills.title: Catharsis
skills.description: Killing an enemy that has suffered from your Status Effect creates an Explosion, dealing [Attuned Element] Area Skill Damage. Any other Status Effects active at death create extra Elemental Explosions. Cooldown: 8s

skills.title: Sustainment
skills.description: Dealing direct Elemental Damage heals you.

skills.title: Conflux
skills.description: Applying a Status Effect has a chance to apply an extra Fire, Shock, or Corrosive Status Effect to the enemy.

skills.title: Forceful Expression
skills.description: Your Gun, Grenade, and Shield Damage deals +18% Bonus [Attuned Element] Damage. The skills Indiscriminate and Do unto Others also deal Bonus Damage.

skills.title: Trust in Yourself
skills.description: On Shield break, you gain stacking Reload Speed, Charge Speed, and Weapon Swap Speed for a short time. If Melee Damage breaks your shield you gain 2 stacks. Max Stacks: 2 Stack Duration: 24s

skills.title: No Mistakes in Nature
skills.description: Applying a Status Effect increases your Melee Damage for a short time. Duration: 12s

skills.title: Heavy Rain
skills.description: Increases your Area Damage and Projectile Speed.

skills.title: Go with the Flow
skills.description: Freezing an enemy increases your Movement Speed and Gun Damage for a short time. Duration: 16s

skills.title: Unweave the Rainbow
skills.description: Dealing Melee or Area Damage to a frozen target adds extra [Attuned Element] Skill Damage*. *Advanced Details on Skill Page.

skills.title: Ebb and Flow
skills.description: Getting a Melee Damage kill restores Health based on the killing blow Damage.

skills.title: Combo Breaker
skills.description: Killing an enemy with Melee Damage has a chance to reset your Action Skill Cooldown. Chance: 20%

skills.title: Joyful Freedom
skills.description: Activating an Action Skill stacks Melee Damage for a short time. Max Stacks: unlimited Stack Duration: 12s

skills.title: Burn Both Ends
skills.description: Activating an Action Skill, taunts enemies in a large radius causing them to attack you. Taking enemy damage grants stacking Elemental and Physical Damage for a short time. Max Stacks: 15 Stack Duration: 8s

skills.title: Body and Mind
skills.description: Killing an enemy adds extra [Attuned Element] Area Skill Damage to your Melee Damage for a short time. Duration: 12s

skills.title: Free the Soul
skills.description: Killing a frozen enemy, sends out 2 homing splinters at an enemy, dealing Cryo Area Skill Damage. Cooldown: 3s

skills.title: Atman
skills.description: Increases your Skill Damage.

skills.title: Clear the Mind
skills.description: Killing an enemy lets you ignore enemies' Elemental Resistance for a short time. Duration: 8s Elemental Immunity is unaffected!
